# stringa

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

**stringa** is a collection of miscellaneous tools and data sets for working with text data.

## Installation

You can install this package using:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("adamoshen/stringa")
```
